attributes.action: removal of 'dead baby jokes' page on facebook
attributes.additional_details: There is a page on facebook which is titled 'dead baby jokes' thousands upon thousands have reported it to facebook and it hasn't been removed! Its time to take this further and have someone high up ban this page, there are over 24,000 likers of this page who make fun of others tragic loses, there are vile pictures posted of stillborn children, people make jokes and poke fun at those who have lost a child, its disgusting behavior yet facebook made a statement that its not againts their policies when an article featured in 'take a break' magazine, please support us banning such a horrible page! Thankyou!
